channel.title: Bug in first mission intro
channel.description: So when i finish the ride on train (intro to the game), i got to the final station, and i can't exit the train, i mean there's no NPC to open it for me! And when i press E near green/red button nothing happens. Please help! Thanks!

item.title: Bug in first mission intro
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Try starting a new game at Anomalous Materials.

item.title: Bug in first mission intro
item.dc:creator: Dimburuk
item.description:
So when i finish the ride on train (intro to the game), i got to the final station, and i can’t exit the train, i mean there’s no NPC to open it for me! And when i press E near green/red button nothing happens. Please help! Thanks!
